sentences.sContent: And then an ecstatic scream of joy; and then , alas !
sentences.sContent_eng: And then an ecstatic scream of joy; and then , alas !
sentences.sCn: 接着是一声欣喜若狂的尖叫，哎呀！

sentences.sContent: “Peopleask us how he would have felt now that we have a black President, and we knowhe would have been ecstatic, ” Emily said.
sentences.sContent_eng: “Peopleask us how he would have felt now that we have a black President, and we knowhe would have been ecstatic, ” Emily said.
sentences.sCn: “人们问我们如果父亲在世会怎样评价我们有一位黑人总统，我们知道他一定会欣喜若狂。” 艾米丽说。

sentences.sContent: As the woman makes plans of a future with the perfect mate, her emotions are ecstatic.
sentences.sContent_eng: As the woman makes plans of a future with the perfect mate, her emotions are ecstatic.
sentences.sCn: 当一个女人和自己最好的伴侣计划未来时，她的激情就会欣喜若狂。
